attributes.action: Sack Brian Barwick and introdroduce a minimum number of English players per football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of England's poor performance in Euro 08,the worst since 1994, Brian Barwick who hired Steve McClaren should be removed and all English club sides must be forced to use a minimum number of English players to protect our national side.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
